tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She provided info about the problem and treatment. She is good but cloudnine hospital charging so much of money though I have insurance.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Pooja has been my gynecologist for the last two years. She has guided me through my PCOS problems and helped my husband and me understand the impacts of this condition while trying to conceive. A few months back, when I went through an ectopic pregnancy and had to undergo emergency surgery, Dr. Pooja ensured that I was well informed about the operation and its implications. She was extremely gentle yet practical with the information, which helped me process it. Even post-surgery, I was well taken care of. She answered all my questions and queries with patience and provided the right information.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Pooja is an Angel for my newborn! I was 35 yrs, wt. 48 kg, ht. 5 inc when i conceived naturally. I never could have imagined of delivering normally, but throughout my pregnancy Dr.Pooja believed in me and put a faith that I can have a normal delivery. *** ****** ***** **** *** **** **** **** ** ***** I have been scared of injection always, & believe me she kept it at minimal, limited medicines & injections, crucial ones only! She definitely knows her patients! She ensured to answer all of my whats/whys/hows, this was my first pregnancy. She definitely made the journey so simple & fun. On the day of delivery, I still thought I cannot do it when the pain was shooting up, felt i dont have that strength in me but Dr.Pooja and her team kept on saying "You are progessing well, You are doing well!! this was kinda moral support honestly! Just that you know  I was in labor for 10 hours. For me, Dr.Pooja is literally GOD for bringing a life in our lives! I was lucky that she was My Doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Choosing Dr Pooja is the best decision we took in our Pregnancy.  She is very friendly which  gives you confidence to have open discussion.  professionally also she gives you lot of time and attention.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We are very thankful to Dr.Pooja for treating my  wife with care and love. Once she diagnosed the issue ,  she would promptly provide pros and cons so as a patient  it's very important to take the firm decision. Dr Pooja is very polite and friendly in nature which is very much required for treating patients for quick recovery. She will always help patients in terms of providing info with regards to insurance by pointing us in the right direction.  Thankyou Dr.Pooja for all your help much appreciated.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We started consulting Dr. Pooja right from start of our pregnancy till delivery the process has been smooth. She always greeted us with a smile and was always available through call and whatsapp whenever any problems occurred. She gifted us with the delivery of a baby girl. I would always recommend her. We are forever thankful to Dr. Pooja for bringing us bundle of joy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Pooja Sahni is very friendly doctor. She is friendly, calm and approachable. She treated me in a very friendly manner. She used to respond to all my messages and calls which helped me a lot as I was going through anxiety issues. Initially I used to call and message mam time and again for which she gave me prompt response and treatment with patience. 
     Before consulting Pooja mam I had consulted other doctor which became a very bad experience because of the misguiding nature of that doctor and treatment which was very expensive for me. I started suffering from anxiety issues and had to go to therapist and my therapist gave reference of Dr. Pooja Sahni. I am very happy that I consulted Pooja mam. It came to know that I have fibroid and when I was worried abt it, mam explained me what it is and her communication always gave me relaxation. 
     I am sharing this review with pleasure and regards for Dr. Pooja Sahni

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
I had the privilege of being under the care of Dr. Pooja Sahani, a remarkable gynecologist at Cloudnine Hospital, HRBR Layout, throughout my pregnancy journey. From day one until the moment of delivery, Dr. Pooja exhibited an exceptional level of professionalism, empathy, and expertise.

One standout quality is Dr. Pooja's unwavering commitment to promoting natural childbirth. In a healthcare landscape where cesarean sections are often suggested, Dr. Pooja stood out by consistently advocating for and motivating a normal delivery. Her approach reflects a dedication to the well-being of both mother and baby, showcasing a genuine concern for the natural birthing process.

Throughout my prenatal visits, Dr. Pooja displayed commendable patience, taking the time to address all my concerns and providing thorough explanations. Her ability to create a supportive and comfortable environment made the entire journey more manageable. The personalized care and attention she extended instilled confidence, making me feel secure in her hands.

In conclusion, Dr. Pooja Sahani's professionalism, dedication to natural childbirth, patience, and excellent communication skills make her an outstanding gynecologist. My experience with her at Cloudnine Hospital, HRBR Layout, has been nothing short of exceptional, and I wholeheartedly recommend her to anyone seeking comprehensive and compassionate maternity care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My mother was detected with uterine fibroids and everyone in the family was confused about the diagnosis and even the next step procedures. Dr Poojas was extremely friendly and helpful in the manner of explaining to us what the issue is and also the next steps. We were told by few doctors that the removal will involve an open suregery whilw others told us that laproscopy will do. She explained to us the benefits and requirements on each procedure and helped us arrive at the right decision. She also ensured that my other was mentally prepared before the surgery. Today all is well thanks to her recommendations and precious guidance.

tags: None
review:
Our first child, Dr Pooja was our first maternal doctor. We never had any bad experiences until she left Cloudnine hospital to join another.
Because other hospitals were far from our home, we decided to continue at cloudnine but with another doctor. This is when we realised, not all doctors choose this profession to help others. Most of them become doctors to earn money. One fine morning after 3 months of pregnancy and previous painful miss carriage, my wife noticed blood and that‚Äôs when we called our new doctor just to ask if we need to come to hospital. Her first response was, how dare you call me this early in the morning, take an appointment and visit me in the hospital. It was 9.00 AM and it was an emergency because we didn‚Äôt knew what was to be done.
Then we decided to call Dr. Pooja and she was there for our rescue. That realisation hit us hard and we decided to change our hospital for good, even when Dr. Pooja‚Äôs hospital was far, we decided to consult with her.
Today, we have a healthy baby and thanks to her. May god bless her.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words.

I really recommend Dr. Pooja. She is experienced and at the same time very friendly(very rare combination).  My mom had diagnosed with ovarian cancer at the age of 59 which made me anxious because it can be genetic too. I decided to go for a regular consultation where I can talk about all my doubts . My friend recommended Dr. Pooja and after meeting her I knew I made the right decision.She listens all your concerns patiently and answers those with lots of assurance. 
 I found my Gynecologist üòä . Thanks doctor Pooja!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
***** ***** ** *** ** *** **** ************ * **** **** ** ***. I am really thankful for the care given during pregnancy and delivery.  She is always available for support and guidance be it any time of the day. She listens very patiently and explains things very nicely.  
In the initial phase of pregnancy she gave me lot of confidence and guided so well. I reached out to her many times during her off duty timings. She keeps a check on the progress and recovery from the issues.
During delivery, she was with me throughout. Her presence gave me lot of courage. 
Overall I had best experience with her. She is knowledge, patient, explains things clearly, always available and values patient's money. Once she even returned fees.Always prescribed scans and tests which are absolutely necessary.
I felt as if I am talking to my elder sister. 
Thank you so much Ma'am for everything.

review: Many Thanks to Pooja Mam for her kind support during pregnancy(third trimester).  Up to second trimester i was consulting another doctor in a different hosp. I saw pooja mam for second opinion and she reviewed all my previous reports and gave me confident to continue the pregnancy and not to do unwanted procedures .. we were depressed mentally before meeting pooja mam.. she spends more time and clarify all our doubts.. she is very friendly and supported till my end of pregnancy.. Finally we are blessed with healthy baby boy.. Thanks a lot pooja mam..

review:
We owe our lives to Dr.Pooja. We have been consulting her from the start of my wifes  pregnancy. The doctor is warm and friendly and spends lot of time with us to understand our concerns, queries and helps us with her soothing words &and treatment. Not all doctors are available at all points of time but she is always reachable at any point of time. Even if we reach out in the midnight, she responds and follows up with us to know the status. She always suggests simple natural remedies but never suggested for any extra medicine or forced for any process.
During labor also, she understood my wife‚Äôs state of mind and provided all the required support. The care she took is beyond words and we are blessed with our baby. She is reliable, trustworthy, friendly and we willbe grateful to her for our entire lives.Thanks Maam we owe you you have magical wand in your hand.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had an exceptional experience with Dr.Pooja Sahni, in Cloudnine HRBR. From the moment I arrived at her opd, I was impressed by the warm and welcoming atmosphere, which immediately put me at ease. Dr. Pooja is incredibly knowledgeable and took the time to listen to all of my concerns and answer all of my questions with great patience and empathy.

Not only was Dr. Pooja professional and thorough in her examinations, but she also made sure to explain everything she was doing and why, which helped me feel more comfortable and informed.
Even during labor, she provided me with support and as per my wish, tried her best to help me with normal vaginal delivery. 
Overall, I would highly recommend Dr. Pooja Sahni to anyone looking for a compassionate, skilled, and trustworthy gynecologist/obstetrician . She truly goes above and beyond to provide exceptional care and support to her patients.

review:
As a patient we seek for a doctor who is knowledgeable, friendly, approachable and listening to patient‚Äôs problems.

We consulted Dr. Pooja throughout my wife‚Äôs pregnancy and post pregnancy period. Even a small problem is discussed & attended very well. We were always keen to know everything happening during pregnancy and precautions to be taken and she explains it really well. She is soft spoken and has in-depth knowledge about her subject. She clearly explains the risks involve in pregnancy in advance and provides the treatment accordingly. She won‚Äôt start or provide medicines unnecessarily until it‚Äôs really needed.

Dr Pooja is very understanding, compassionate and supportive. I will highly recommend her to my friends & family, if they needed any gynecologist consultation.

review:

Based on the report, she patiently and transparently explained about every parameters and its consequences. review:
What's most critical is that Dr. Pooja is approachable, not something that can be said about many of the Doctor's today. This in itself is such a relief when one is suffering from things that one doesn't really understand. She responds on WhatsApp or a call making you feel heard. She is patient and understands your issues (even if she's heard them all several times before!) before deciding the course of action ahead. 
I'm glad i met her and decided to go with her for a procedure i was really worried about. But she made it really easy and I'm back to being almost fully functional, in just about 2 days, which to me is something I'm grateful for. 
Thank you Dr. Poojan Sahni.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words.

context: Pregnancy Check Up,Laparoscopic Surgery of Ectopic Pregnancy,
review: I visited Dr. Pooja after a positive pregnancy test result at home. I had previous history of ectopic pregnancy. To confirm the current pregnancy I took beta hcg tests twice, the results didn't double and in further scan done ectopic pregnancy was confirmed. We opted for medical management but had to do salpingectomy due to severe abdomen and back pain. I got the stitches removed after a week. I got a wound infected after two weeks and got it treated by visiting again. I feel better now. Throughout this, I contacted her several times via whatsapp and she always responded and guided me through the tough times. I would definitely recommend her.
